::Lord Elder/Scorponok/Zarak::

Elder: Then I suggest you show good will and help defeat the Decepticon. Perhaps afterwards you could discuss things with these Maximals. I would happily mediate it to avoid further conflict.

Elder fires two shots at Scorponok's tail.

Scorponok's tail was already damaged and between the axe and Elder's shots the tail was severed. Scorponok no longer had use of his fusion cannon.

Zarak: What a backwards world this is with Maximals and Predacons who dont even know what side their on.... DIE!!!!

Scorponok releases a full barage at Elder and Jotunn, minus the fusion cannon. This included four missiles and the many body mounted laser turrets on rapid fire.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Jotunn glared at Elder for a few tense moments, then started
 chuckling, a chuckle that soon turned into a full fledged laugh.
 
 Jotunn: Ah! Elder! Of course, I can only blame myself for the
 confusion. (He stopped being pleasant) But then again, I must explain
  my action once more. If I am to protect this planet against the
 Minions, I need the means to do that. I order for me to have the means
 to give you freedom, I must wrench it out of the hands of people like
 Razorwing who distrust me at every occasion. I am being depicted as a
 tyrant and a madbot, I know, but that, ultimately, is for no other
 reason than the greater good. I will protect my fellow transformers no
 matter the cost!
 
 At that, he swung his axe at Scorponok, clearly trying to severe his tail.
 
 Jotunn: The Decepticon brought dishonesty and corruption. They killed.
 I hate them for that. They forgot their priorities. I don't!
